TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OperationFlow extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the type of transmission an endpoint of the XML Web service can support.

span.span: Specifies the type of transmission an endpoint of the XML Web service can support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Embora as operações de solicitação-resposta ou solicitação-resposta logicamente são correlacionadas no documento WSDL Web Services Description Language (), as informações de correlação concreta serão especificadas por uma associação.Although request-response or solicit-response operations are logically correlated in the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document, the concrete correlation information will be specified by a binding. Por exemplo, as mensagens de solicitação e resposta podem ser trocadas como parte de um ou dois transmissões HTTP reais.For example, the request and response messages can be exchanged as part of one or two actual HTTP transmissions. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir demonstra o uso de `OperationFlow` enumeração.The following sample demonstrates the use of the `OperationFlow` enumeration. [!code-cpp[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationFlow_Enum/CPP/operationflow_enum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationFlow_Enum/CS/operationflow_enum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OperationFlow_Enum#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/OperationFlow_Enum/VB/operationflow_enum.vb#1)]

summary.span: Indicates that the endpoint of the XML Web service receives no transmissions.
